item.title: View Resource Usage
item.description:
This section explains how to view workspace resource usage.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Settings Viewing permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Settings Viewing permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Overview in the left navigation pane.

    The Resource Usage tab on the Overview page provides information on the number of projects, roles, and members in the workspace.

item.title: View Cluster Information
item.description:
This section explains how to view basic information about the clusters authorized for the workspace.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Settings Viewing permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Settings Viewing permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Overview in the left navigation pane.

  3. Click the Cluster Information tab on the Overview page to view basic information about the clusters authorized for the workspace.
